column5: My place is the perfect getaway for families & groups! Located in North Richland Hills, our home is:  - 10 minutes to Northeast Mall - 20 minutes to DFW Airport - 35 minutes to Dallas Love Field Airport - 20 minutes to Downtown Fort Worth and TCU Campus - 20 minutes to Six Flags Over Texas, Cowboys Stadium, and Rangers Ballpark - 25 minutes to Gaylord Texan Hotel - 35 minutes to Downtown Dallas, American Airlines Center, Galleria of Dallas, etc. - 35 minutes to Texas Motor Speedway and UNT
column8: Cozy & Spacious XL Suite - Central to DFW!
